Bonjour, 

Nous sommes navrés de lire que vous n'êtes pas pleinement satisfait de votre expérience chez Younited. 

Malheureusement, nous ne pouvons communiquer de façon détaillée sur nos règles d’analyse interne et selon le principe de la liberté contractuelle (article 1101 du code civil).

Nous comprenons votre déception, mais espérons que vous comprendrez notre démarche, qui se veut la plus sérieuse et honnête possible.

Nous mettons également à votre disposition un de nos partenaires par le biais du mail comprenant la décision de votre dossier afin de vous aider dans votre recherche de financement. 

Excellente journée

commentaire: Seamless experienceÀ few click and I was done.

People isn't really bank people Impossible to receive when problems Response at mail are very often incoherent and usefulness, no interest, problem understanding when demand no indicate name because lots problem, proces, saboted, block accounts...Families condamned at indemnity compensate and receive nothing, identity thief very often Recommend physical bank except french bank postal always scammers that really worst than bourso bank No need invest in this bank Boursorama a few years ago was very better Fortunately app is very great, lots possibility but sometimes impossible to unlock some accounts, progress is possible

I strongly advise against using this neo bank. I transferred €1,500 from my PayPal account to my Boursorama account, and my account has been locked for three weeks now (and it's still locked). I've contacted customer service daily, but they've been unable to provide any further information or resolve the issue. i've had to rely on friends and family to transfer money to cover my rent and other bills since I've been unable to use my bank card or make any transfers. They asked me to send documents to prove the transfer which i did the same day i received the mail and 2 weeks later (after calling them everyday) they told me that they lost the documents??? This level of incompetence is unacceptable; I've never encountered a bank that leaves its customers stranded without solutions. The worst part is that they never once reached out to me; I was the one constantly chasing them for answers. My advice is to steer clear at all costs.

titre_com: I would not recommend Orange Bank
commentaire: I would not recommend Orange Bank. Currently I am trying to transfer some funds from my account to another bank. They take the money from your account but do not transfer it. Then, 4 days later, they send an email telling you the transfer needs validating. However there is no way to validate the transfer in the application. So you have to ask the AI for help, who eventually connects you with a service advisor. I was connected to 'Sarah Conseiller 76' who was unable to help, and told me I have to wait another 48 hours to speak with an advisor who can validate the payment. When I questioned why, she ended the conversation by disconnecting me. A highly questionable way to deal with customers.
reponses:
Bonjour Mike,

Nous sommes sincèrement navrés d'apprendre que le conseiller en charge de votre demande n'ait pas pu répondre à vos attentes.

Vous pouvez prendre contact avec nous par e-mail : webmaster@orangebank.fr.

En vous souhaitant une belle journée,

Emma

commentaire: Orange Bank est la meilleure banque en ligne.
Très bon services

Horrible experience. I have been contacted for providing “explanations” about my incoming bank transfer. I have provided all evidences that my bank transfers are legit. Despite this they locked my account and my card. And they didn’t ask me a new iban where to transfer MY MONEY more than 9.000€. I bring them to the Court. BE AWARE

Initially everything was fine, but after my second transaction (something I sold online through platform and received a payment from someone) things went down quickly.Firstly, sumeria or Lydia, frozen my account for verification. Started asking quastions about both parties, such as identity card and handwritten note about the purchase.Asked for various proofs of acquisition and answering once a day at most.I explained that the person who bought the product didn't want his identity card sent anywhere.Now after a week of back and forth messages (they say the average time to solve these kind of questions is 24hours, what a joke), the bank completely left me out of my account, being not possible to access the app at all, no reason was given by any mean of communication and I have around 1k euro which sumeria holds now.Now, after paying the service (black card), having some money on account, they block your account, have your money, will obviously get payments for the monthly subscription without hesitation and won't even contact you. What a joke of a service and customer support. Please stay away from this nonsense and just opt for the Revolut.

titre_com: Good, but could be a bit better !
commentaire: Just a good Visa card bank service. I appreciate the current balance being shown as soon as I make a payment. It would be nice to be able to write a personal description against the debits, like in some other banks. Pity the logging in process is rather lengthy and cumbersome. Otherwise I am happy enough with Lydia.

Très bonne application. Prise en main facile, possibilité de faire des économies et préparer des evenements (enveloppes). Définir le mot de passe de la carte, belle initiative. Dommage que la carte lydia + black ne soit pas à relief et que les multiples optionnne soit pas disponible en guadeloupe.

I don't know if the company is French or not, but this app and the services it provides are AMAZING! Unparalleled in France specially in the banking industry. With Lydia forget other banks everything you need to manage your money and make it work for you.

I love how Lydia evolved ! It’s easy, there are so many possibilities between using it with your partner for shared account or create money pots for someone’s birthday. The possibility to create multiple accounts and to use it abroad (I live in Turkey) . Love it !
Super application j’adore . Les transactions se font rapidement et sans surprise. Je recommande j’ai pris la carte gratuite qui va avec

titre_com: Been using Lydia for money pots…
commentaire: Been using Lydia for money pots (friends birthdays) and as a separate bank account for a couple of months now, which proved to be really useful and practical for my monthly groceries budgeting. The app is reliable, responsive and easy to use.

titre_com: Easy navigation and very helpful for common expenses
commentaire: Easy navigation, user friendly interface, very useful for common expenses. Plus, no free for abroad payments.
I found it quite good. I received my parcel before required time and online payment method is safe. So far for me it's good experience overall.

Lydia services are exceptionally good. Lydia adapts to you, sends you immediate notifications when payments are made, reducing fraud. There are no exchange rates, and the fact that you can have a physical card and chose which account to debit is just perfect.
Fonctionnement simple. Application claire. Mode de paiement hyper fiables, qu’il s’agissant de la CB (via Apple Pay pour ce qui me concerne) ou les CB à usage unique

Lydia is great because it is simple to use, the platform is very nice, i like the fact that every transactions are immediately notified on our account and all the features. The only minus is that we can’t do cash deposit but that’s for every internet banking.  I recommend

titre_com: Simple a ouvrir simple d’utilisation on…
commentaire: Simple a ouvrir simple d’utilisation on vois en temps réel les dépenses et le solde restant.

Hello!I'm happy to share you my experience of what I see that Lydia, for sure is one of the online banking SYSTEM I ever seen, their system is legit, I mean very secured (I like 1 time card number to use online payment) deposit and withdraw are awesome and support team is really helpful. Lydia team keep it up. I appreciate and proud of being your client.

titre_com: More features than my regular bank
commentaire: Many useful features that my regular bank lacks. For example, the ability to have 2 VISA, the ability to create sub accounts dedicated for projects, the ability to "plug" a VISA on a sub accounts instantly, the ablilty to share a sub account with other lydia users...

Good for most thing, you can shop with it as much as you can use it for repaying your friends.Work well with Apple Pay too!Only issue is that the access to the support is quite tricky (to stay polite). Someone is trying to pay with my card smh, and I can’t find a way to report it to Lydia (it’s not working btw is receive declined payments, but STILL)
Hi Good afternoonI am very happy to open Lydia account and service for team it's very helpful I am very glad I contacted with Lydia and Lydia all team.     Best regard.
Easy to manage and to use, good security profile. The staff is very helpfull with a rapid response. I do highly recommende it!Keep the great work!

titre_com: Seamless Banking Experience with Lydia - A Five-Star Marvel!
commentaire: I've been using Lydia as my online bank, and I'm extremely satisfied with the service! The user-friendly interface makes managing my finances a breeze. The app is fast, secure, and provides all the features I need for seamless banking. The customer support is responsive and helpful whenever I have a question. Lydia has truly simplified my banking experience, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable online banking solution.

Also they have kept my 5000 euro blocked in that account .I have sent them msg to contact me and to solve my problem , Its been , 3 month , they are telling me only to wait . This can not be a professional service . I doubt , they try to steal money ,in disguise of blocking Account . I already let Banque de France , about this matter . So i strictly , request people , not to open account in this Anytym Bank .
reponses:
Hi Sayed,

We are sorry for your negative experience with Anytime.

We regret that our services do not meet your needs.

We certainly cannot erase what happened, but we take these kinds of cases very seriously. Therefore our aim is to make sure that something like this won't happen anymore.

We wish you all the best for the future.

Barbara - Anytime

titre_com: The worst bank I have ever worked with
commentaire: The worst bank I have ever worked with.  They are unreachable. They allow you to sign up for appointments and then they don’t honor them (3 in a row for us), don’t answer emails, don’t respond by telephone, don’t permit you to make transfers, and are blocking our nearly 8000 euros. This is not a business bank. It’s clearly a scam.
reponses:
Hi,

Thank you for your feedback, although it is negative.

We are deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, your package does not give you access to our telephone line. This is why our internal messaging service is available to answer all your questions.

If you wish to have access to our customer service on the phone, we invite you to subscribe to the EASY package. Here is a comparison of our rates: https://www.anyti.me/fr/tarifs/.

We remain at your disposal,

Barbara - Anytime

titre_com: Everything was great until you sign up
commentaire: I initially gave a good review to anytime as they were great when we set up the account, which is for a new association. Our association raises money for people with rare diseases in Ukraine impacted by the war.  Now that it's time to send the money to the beneficiaries, we're told that you can only make transfers to SEPA countries with an IBAN number. Even countries outside of SEPA who have affiliated banks in the EU are no good because anytime won't let you make transfers using Swift anymore.  Since joining they have also completely disabled features to get or send cheques. (This may seem like not a big deal, until someone wants to make you a donation).  When you ask for help you get annoying AI generated responses inviting you to 'find another solution' but 'rest assured, you can still make a transfer via iban in SEPA.'  This account is very expensive for what it is. It's basically a scam. They understood where and how I wanted to send transfers when i set up the account and now there is literally nothing I can do except send the money to my personal account-so what's the point. Traditional French banks are slower and they don't like to open small association accounts so they will try to put you off, but honestly it's worth the hassle because this 'bank' really is not fit for purpose.
reponses:
Hi Michael,

We appreciate your initial positive review and we're truly sorry to hear about your recent experiences with our services. We understand the importance of the work your association is doing to support those affected by rare diseases in Ukraine during these challenging times, and we apologize for any inconvenience you've encountered.

Our goal is to provide a reliable and efficient banking experience, and it's disheartening to hear that we've fallen short of your expectations.

We understand that you've encountered difficulties with international transfers outside the SEPA region. We acknowledge that this limitation can be frustrating, and we're actively exploring ways to expand our international transfer options to better serve our diverse customer base.

We apologize for the inconvenience you've faced with the disabled cheque features. While cheques have become less common in today's digital banking landscape, we recognize that they still hold value in certain situations. We will review the possibility of reinstating this feature or providing an alternative solution.

Thank you for bringing these issues to our attention, and we hope to have the opportunity to regain your trust in the future.

Sincerely,

Barbara - Anytime

commentaire: I have been waiting for a month to open an account. I sent all the necessary documents, salary slips, proof of u, tax papers, id....I was asked to send the same documents at least three times... and was told that my account would soon be open....well I'm still waiting. I urgently needed a bank statement...so I heard of N26...it took a few minutes to open my account and I downloaded a bank statement..no problem. My intention to just forget about Fortuneo has been confirmed on my coming on to this forum.
Date of experience: July 15, 2024

4 days my transfer of 20510 euro is delayed and because of this the purchase of my appartement is jeopardized.  the reason I believe is that the NONQUALIFIED employees of the customer service believes that there is Money laundering.I am waiting for hours on the phone without in the end getting a non qualified answer.   It is the worst client service I have experienced with a Banc EUROPEWIDE.  ( Germany, Spain and Austria ) DEFINTELY I WILL CHANGE THE BANC AND FIND ANOTHER BANC in AUSTRIA. There are many other bancs in Europe with minor charges but with QUALIFIED employees:KEEP AWAY FROM FORTUNEO ( I am since 15 years a client with FORTUNEO )   1 STAR IS TOO MUCH against the nerves and the money I lost because of these incompetent  Fortuneo employees
Super L’interface et facile à utiliser et le service client et au top !

titre_com: Pixpay has definitely made my life as a…
commentaire: Pixpay has definitely made my life as a parent easier. I deposit money every month into my kids Pixpay card and then they can use it whenever. I gave a 3 star because , the application is still abit confusing to use. I can’t find features easily like other bank applications. To find something in the app I really need to go in circles to find it. For example , I’d like to change the plafond per month but to date I still can not change it. Only because I can’t find it on the app. So maybe if the team can revise the app and make it much more easier to complete tasks on app , would be great. The support team though is very responsive to any questions, fast and very active. A huge plus.
reponses:
Hello Susana,

With Pixpay, you manage your teenager's spending limits.

To do this, go to your Pixpay application, tab CARD, heading "Payment limits".
You can increase or decrease the spending limit and, if you wish, you can even remove it completely (by unchecking the box). You can also choose to set a weekly or monthly limit.

The change will be reflected immediately on your teenager's card. 🙂

Pol

titre_com: Almost impossible to open an account
commentaire: It was one of the most terrible experiences I had when I tried to open an account with Monabanq. I have bank accounts in different countries (Italy, Germany), and I NEVER had 1/10 of the problems I had with them. In a nutshell, it is almost impossible to open an account with them if you just moved to French (it does not matter your condition).And when you try to contact them, they don't answer you (by email), or the people on the chat always say that you need to send an email to another team (which nobody answers you) or call them (if you don't speak French, that is my case, you cannot call them because they don't have any services in English). I kind of understand that they cannot offer a call line with English speakers, but the people on the chat service should AT LEAST try to solve your problem instead of saying you to send an email.
Superbe !!!
reponses:
Merci pour cette superbe note Virgil !

Vous êtes au centre de notre attention.

Nous vous souhaitons une très belle année.

Manon de l'équipe Monabanq.

commentaire: Je suis un client satisfait de La Poste Ma French Bank depuis environ 3 ans.  Jusqu’à ma conversation d’aujourd’hui avec l’un de vos agents du service client, j’aurais recommandé vos services à tout le monde.  Cependant, en raison de l'attitude et de l'impolitesse de l'homme avec qui j'ai parlé dans votre service client aujourd'hui à 10h30, mon opinion sur Ma French Bank a complètement changé.  ironiquement, j'ai contacté votre service client car j'étais en train d'ouvrir un compte chez vous pour ma fille de 12 ans.  Potentiellement, elle aurait pu être une de vos clientes à vie, mais elle a entendu ma conversation avec votre représentant et son attitude grossière. Sa réponse a été qu'elle voulait ouvrir son premier compte bancaire auprès d'une autre banque parce qu'elle n'aimait pas le ton de votre représentant.  avec moi et moi non plus.I've been been a happy customer of La Poste Ma French Bank for about 3 years. Until my conversation today with one of your customer service agents,  I would have recommended your services to anyone and everyone. However, due to the attitude and rudeness of the man I spoke to in your customer service department today at 10h30, my opinion of Ma French Bank has completely changed. ironically, I contacted your customer service department because I was in the process of opening an account with yourselves for my 12 year old daughter. Potentially she could have been a life long customer of yours, but she overheard my conversation with your representative and his rude manner, her response was that she wanted to open her first bank account with a different bank because she didn't like your representatives tone with me and neither did I.
reponses:
Bonjour David,
Merci d'avoir pris le temps de nous laisser cet avis, nous aimerions en savoir plus pouvez-vous nous contacter via Messenger, X ou Instagram afin que nous puissions voir cela ensemble ?
L'équipe Ma French Bank.

commentaire: Very bad service. They are not clear about the requirements (French/EU nationals only accepted) when a UK based business wants to setup a subsidiary. Everything is fine until we make the payment to open the Capital Deposit account, and it gets rejected after 2-3 days. I paid 3 times and got rejected. End of the day, they do not accept any UK based element - shareholder, director, manager, passport, address - and just need a French national with French residency. Not sure how much they harass non-EU/EEA (Asian/African) businesses trying to establish in France/EU. This is not a requirement of the Registrar of Companies, but the bank has made it mandatory only to punish us for Brexit. It is hypocrisy that these so called Developed Western talk about difficulty of doing business in developing countries like India or China or African nations.
reponses: Hello Vikram, I am truly sorry to read that our service has led to such disappointment. As a payment institution, we are governed to strict requirements that may lead us to refuse certain projects. For regulatory reasons, we cannot share all the reasons for such decisions. I invite you to contact us at feedback@shine.fr to discuss this matter in greater detail. Best regards, Anne de Shine

titre_com: My teen is without card since several…
commentaire: My teen is without card since several weeks. Again and again we are assured that a card has been sent, but no card ever arrived. There is no customer service. You are constantly wasting your time chatting with bots. If you have a real person (and you cannot really be sure of that because the answers are standardised) they promise to solve the problem but nothing happens. Yet, we have to pay for the card and the subscription. Kard does not share any proof that a card was ever sent. I have asked to be reimbursed and to receive my money back. We will see how long it takes. Great deception. It would be a good if they had customer service. Update: after several weeks and repeated lies about cards having been sent, I asked to close the account and be reimbursed. It is then that Kard informed me that their cards are out of stock! And they have no idea when cards will be restocked.

commentaire: I tried to open an account for my son. I did everything requested, and scanned my documents. I was told they were accepted. However, after three weeks, the card had not arrived. When I tried to login, I was told my email address did not exist.  One of the employees looked into the problem, and told me she could not understand. She later got back to me and told me that my identity card did not conform to French standard. This is very strange as I have a French identity card. I also do not understand why they did not tell me about this problem before.  From the small amount of experience I have with this company, I can see that they are not a company to trust.

commentaire: This bank is not reliable, it’s been almost 2 months that they blocked my transaction of 2800€ , they refuse to release the fund neither return them back to the sender, no more response from the serviceLydia
reponses: Votre compte a en effet été bloqué suite à une opération de conformité, dans le cadre de notre devoir de vigilance. Notre équipe Conformité est en train de finaliser l'analyse, elle reviendra vers vous au plus vite. — Nina

commentaire: Opened an account 2 weeks ago. Quick and easy. First day the app worked fine, 2 days later I couldn't read who made the transfers. Reported problem, was told it would be fixed. Been trying to get in touch in multiple ways for over a week now, but no response. Starting to get troublesome.
reponses: Marjan, votre avis m'étonne. Nous sommes bien revenu vers vous à la suite de votre mail. Vos virements ont bien été exécutés. N'hésitez pas à revenir vers votre conseiller, il sera ravi de vous aider ! — Nina

titre_com: Have a cap on withdrawals per month
commentaire: The bank has a cap on how many transactions you are allowed per month. I haven't been able to access my money for the past week and no one answers queries on weekends.In response to their response, their exceptional increase was permitting me 10 more contactless transactions in the month. I don't think raising a query Saturday morning and receiving a response Monday morning is sufficient, especially as I didn't have access to the money in my account all weekend and still don't, despite their response.La banque a un plafond sur le nombre de transactions que vous êtes autorisé par mois. Je n'ai pas pu accéder à mon argent la semaine dernière et personne ne répond aux questions le week-end.En réponse à leur réponse, leur augmentation exceptionnelle me permettait 10 transactions sans contact de plus dans le mois. Je ne pense pas qu'il soit suffisant de poser une question le samedi matin et de recevoir une réponse le lundi matin, d'autant plus que je n'ai pas eu accès à l'argent de mon compte tout le week-end et que je ne l'ai toujours pas, malgré leur réponse.
reponses: Vous nous avez contactés samedi, et dès lundi matin, votre conseillère dédiée a pu vous proposer une hausse exceptionnelle du plafond de votre carte. Tout à fait conscients de la gêne occasionnée, nous sommes navrés que vous estimiez notre service à une étoile. — Florian

commentaire: Le paiement sans-contact à fonctionnement aléatoire.Absence de la fonctionnalité Apple-pay.
reponses: Je vous remercie pour votre retour, Nicolas. Je vois que vous avez utilisé votre carte sans contact à plusieurs reprises. N'hésitez pas à contacter votre conseillère si vous constatez un comportement erratique. Nous procéderons naturellement à un nouvel envoi. Notez qu'après un certain nombre de transactions, il est nécessaire d’insérer la carte dans un terminal pour des raisons de sécurité. Le paiement mobile est attendu. Nous travaillons à son intégration. Je vous souhaite d'excellentes fêtes. — Florian

titre_com: Il me manque que l’Apple Pay
commentaire: Il me manque que l’Apple Pay. Mais sinon c’est top.
reponses: Vous allez être ravie, nous y travaillons ! En route vers la dernière étoile ! — Nina

commentaire: Super fluide et simple.
reponses: Ces cinq étoiles comptent pour nous. Merci ! — Nina

commentaire: The process of opening an account was quite convenient. But there is no mention anywhere that the account will be German.
reponses: Merci pour votre retour. Vous bénéficiez en effet d'un IBAN allemand faisant partie de l'espace unique de paiement en euros. Un IBAN français sera prochainement offert à l'ensemble de nos clients. — Florian

commentaire: Service top. On attend juste le RIB français !

Really excellent application! The bank system of Helios is efficient, quite minimalist, and perfectly does the job. There is a really good use of technology inside of the app, to give users an efficient, full of functionality and simple interface to manage their money. Now, I’m just waiting for the saving accounts.

Very happy to see where my money's going, and for 3€ per month itns reasonable.The app is very simple to use, esthetic and the clear information about climate change is very welcome.I only miss the possibility to have a savings account, but i have heard it's apparently coming soon !Helios unables people to have a strong impact to face the ecological  crisis, so i strongly recomend it !

titre_com: Good enough for such a young bank !
commentaire: There is a few things you need to accept like not being able to put cash on your account but otherwise, it is very affordable and straight forward and knowing that I have a greater impact on the environment is just so important!
Awesome service, does what it says on the tin. I love the idea behind it and it’s so refreshing to see that they are walking the talk. Once they’ll have the savings account I’ll truly be all in !
reponses: Le livret Avenir est d'ores et déjà disponible ! Veillez simplement à disposer de la dernière mise à jour de l'application. — Florian

commentaire: Very good. Still misses a few features.
reponses: En route, je l'espère, vers une cinquième étoile à l'arrivée des prochaines fonctionnalités ! — Romane

commentaire: Finally a sustainable bank! Excellent customer experience with the app and the bank offer is still growing. Helios is just perfect!
Tout au top, manque plus que l'IBAN français !
reponses: Nous partageons votre impatience. Bonne nouvelle, l'IBAN français arrive très prochainement ! En attendant, grâce à l'espace unique de paiement en euros (la zone SEPA), vos opérations sont exécutées de manière identique. — Romane

titre_com: Vert good idea and app working well
commentaire: Vert good idea and app working well. Just miss some details but the bank is growing up
Really smooth app, could use the face id to unlock

Flawless experience. Registration is quick, the card is beautiful and accepted everywhere. Virtual card is a plus !Some technical restrictions due to the yougness of the bank, but it was expected (and not that much of a trouble). Support is great and very responsive !
Great appEasy taking, and overall green.

En tant qu’agent prestataire de service de paiement agréé par l’ACPR, nous sommes parfois amenés à prendre des décisions difficiles. Néanmoins, aucun virement n'est jamais bloqué sans raison valable et vérifiée.

Un message vous a été fait en ce sens vendredi dernier, n'hésitez pas à y répondre directement si vous avez besoin de plus d'information.

Bien à vous,
Camille

commentaire: 100% online bank... but with humans behind and above all a great mission!

titre_com: Very good advices in short terms.
commentaire: Very good advices in short terms.Amazing aims for the planet ! Great banque !
Hyper réactive, all is easy and fast but not only ! Vert humain and kind team that use your money for ethical ans sustainable projets. Vert proud to make a team with them, They are thé future !
reponses:
Merci infiniment pour ce retour chaleureux !
C'est un plaisir de savoir que vous trouvez notre équipe réactive et notre service facile et rapide. Votre soutien à nos projets éthiques et durables est très apprécié.
Ensemble, nous construisons un futur durable. 🌍

commentaire: Great service with outstanding People always at ones disposal to address issues and answer questions. And when the overall mandate and DNA is to contribue genuinely to a cleaner better sustainable world... What else?! Thanks very much Green Got to be by our sides.
reponses:
Thank you so much for your kind words!
We're thrilled to hear that you've had a great experience with our team and that you appreciate our commitment to creating a cleaner and more sustainable world. Your support means a lot to us, and we're grateful to have you on this journey with us. Thank you for choosing Green-Got. 💚

commentaire: I highly recommend it. This is without doubt the banking model that must prevail for our future. The bank is in full development, with a multitude of new projects and features on the horizon. I couldn't wait to switch to Green-got.
reponses: Thank you for your enthusiastic recommendation, Yann! We're thrilled to hear that you believe in our banking model and our vision for the future. We're constantly evolving and developing new projects and features to better serve our members and the planet. We're excited to have you as part of the Green-got community! 🌿

titre_com: Une initiative à la hauteur de l'enjeu climatique
commentaire: An initiative that meets the climate challenge.The team is listening. The offer evolves in accordance with customer requests.By using Green Got as a bank, I feel that I am part of a whole that can shake up the fossilized ideas of other banks.Thanks.Une initiative à la hauteur de l'enjeu climatique. L'équipe est à l'écoute. L'offre évolue en accord avec les demandes des clients. En utilisant Green Got comme banque, je sens que je fais partie d'un tout qui peut faire bouger les idées fossilisées des autres banques. Merci.
reponses:
It's great to know that our initiative resonates with you! We're always ready to listen to our members and strive to develop our offer in line with their needs. Together, we can make a real difference in the transition to more sustainable financial practices. 🌱

Thank you for your support and for being with us, Roxane!


C'est super de savoir que notre initiative trouve écho chez vous ! Nous sommes toujours à l'écoute de nos membres et nous nous efforçons de faire évoluer notre offre en accord avec leurs besoins. Ensemble, nous pouvons faire une réelle différence dans la transition vers des pratiques financières plus durables. 🌱

Merci pour votre soutien et d'être parmi nous, Roxane !

commentaire: Outstanding support! The person I had on the chat went out of their way to provide me with a solution to my problem. Even though it took some time, I got updated all the time without even me asking.Can't recommend enough
reponses: Thank you for the fantastic feedback, Thibaud ! We're thrilled that our support team was able to provide a satisfying solution and that you appreciated the regular updates. Your recommendation means a lot to us. You can always reach out if you need assistance in the future.🌟

commentaire: It's a very good bank, ethical, ecological, young, dynamic and with a great mindset ! The costumer experience is also great ! Love it !
reponses: Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you love our ethical, ecological approach and dynamic mindset. It's fantastic that you're enjoying our customer experience too. Your support means the world to us! 💚

commentaire: Hello, I want to thank you for your quick answers and disponibility.In the future, it might be helpful to offer a migration service from a former bank account to green- got. BestU. Fuhr
reponses:
Hello,

We're glad to hear that you appreciate our quick responses and availability.

Your suggestion regarding a migration service from a former bank account to Green-Got is valuable feedback, and we're working on it ! You can always reach out in case of need.

Best regards, 🦊

commentaire: Love green got. Their team is super sweet, they are easy to reach. I am happy that my money is not funding  climate change, but instead projects to fix it. Also, as green got builds their features they look at what their users ask for and constantly keep them updated. Amazing.
reponses:
Hi there Olga,
Thanks a ton for your lovely feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you love GreenGot and find our team easy to reach.
Your support for our climate-fixing projects means the world to us. At GreenGot, we're dedicated to investing in a greener future.

It's awesome to know that you appreciate our efforts to keep our features updated based on user feedback. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we'll keep striving to deliver the best experience possible.

Feel free to reach out if you have any more questions or suggestions. We're here for you! 🦊

titre_com: Having an impact with your bank account
commentaire: Traditional banks use the money in accounts of their customers to invest in diverse projects - looking at risks and profits, but not their environmental impact.Green-got is one of the too rare banking solution which only invest in sustainable projects. Besides, you can also track the CO2 footprint of your own day-to-day expenses, useful to know where you stand and how you can improve in the future.Great solution which I hope will become mainstream in a near future!
reponses: Hello Benjamin 🦊 I see that impact is dear to you. We released our second impact report last week (available on our networks and website) so that you can see how much we are making a difference together! Our calculations of C02 footprint will be more and more precise and transparency will always be a core value 🌎 to be continued

commentaire: Why continue to deposit your money in a bank that will use it to finance, among other things, fossil fuels, when GreenGot exists? This neo-bank has everything a great one has to offer, the user experience is simply perfect and the money deposited is secure. I use it on a daily basis and, in practice, nothing has changed compared to my old bank, except that basically everything has changed! Thanks to GreenGot for existing and to Maud's team for developing it.Pourquoi continuer à déposer son argent dans une banque qui l'utilisera pour financer, entre autres, les énergies fossiles, quand GreenGot existe ? Cette néo-banque a tout d'une grande, l'expérience utilisateur est simplement parfaite et l'argent déposé est sécurisé. Je l'utilise au quotidien et, en pratique, rien n'a changé par rapport à mon ancienne banque, sauf qu'au fond, tout a changé ! Merci à GreenGot d'exister et à l'équipe de Maud de la développer.
reponses: "Rien a changé mais tout a changé" c'est une bonne idée de slogan ça ! 🔥 Merci à vous, c'est grâce à nos membres que tout est possible. On se répète mais c'est si vrai ! L'union fait la force 💪🏻

titre_com: The bank of the future is here
commentaire: The kind of bank we clearly need these days. A bank that is transparent, communicative and cares for its customers. Of course, the biggest positive point is the impact on the planet, which is largely minimised compared to traditional banks, and that is priceless!
reponses: Transparent + communicative + care = Wow, thank YOU 🙌🏻 it means a lot to the team ! Nothing without you 😍

commentaire: I received very quick and helpful responses from the Green Got team when I received my bank card with a misspelled name and when I was opening a life assurance contract.
reponses: Hello Paul, always happy to help our amazing community. Thank you for your support. 🦊

commentaire: Greengot is a bank that has the best user service and experience. The bank is listening to it's client and is always searching for improvement. Their goal to invest in ecological and with low-impact subjects is a good vision for a bank. Thanks a lot to them and their action !
reponses: Wow Solenne, thank you 🔥 indeed we want the app to be easy to use, and use ecology and finance for a better world, all thanks to you 💚

commentaire: I received the credit card super quickly, the app is easy to use and there is no charge to use this card abroad which is often not the case with the other banks. Moreover, I feel super included in the choice of companies to invest in with my money.
reponses: Hello Eugénie, great comment thank you very much for your word and your time, we'll keep going this way 🦊

commentaire: De belles valeurs, une app sympa et intuitive, un support au client au top.Le trio gagnant! In 💚 with Green Got
reponses:
C'est super d'entendre que vous appréciez nos valeurs, notre application conviviale et le soutien exceptionnel de notre équipe clientèle.
Un grand merci pour votre soutien, Audrey ! 💚

commentaire: They are fast, perfect job, trustful! It is a pleasure chatting with them, they do their best to help you out.
reponses: Thank you for your kind words! We're delighted to hear that you find our service fast, trustworthy, and helpful. It's always a pleasure assisting you. We are here whenever you need help. 🦊

titre_com: Bank transfert Taken twice and nice fox 🦊
commentaire: I had a problem with a bank transfert which has been taken twice, and the problem was solved in less than an hour, with someone very pleasant online. Thanks a lot nice foxes !🦊
reponses: That's fantastic to hear! We're glad we could quickly resolve the issue for you, and we appreciate your kind words. Our team is always here to help. 🦊

commentaire: Great online bank, excellent quick service and super efficient. I once bought something at a fraudulent online shop and they could help me super fast to get my money back.
reponses: Hi there, thanks for this very nice feedback ! We're here for you, anytime 🦊

commentaire: no my name is
EXCELLENTE FORMATION ET IMPLICATION DU DIRIGEANT PASCAL CHERIN
Impeccable merciTrès instructif

5 étoiles pour les engagements. Mais pour la performance ce n'est pas encore ça. Ouverture d'un compte pendant 8 ans ou j'ai déposé 10 000 euros. Les intérêts depuis 8 ans sont de 31 euros au total donc a peine 5 euros par an (0.002%). Avec l'inflation j'ai donc perdu en épargne.

titre_com: La banque la plus engagée dans la transition, solidaire et transparente
commentaire: La banque la plus engagée dans la transition, solidaire et transparente. Votre argent financera uniquement des projets locaux, concrets et à impact !Les autres banques/néo-banques qui disent agir pour la transition investissent en action dans des fonds, qu'ils soient labellisés (finansol, greenfin,...) ou qu'ils suivent une sélection maison, gérés par Natixis, Amundi, etc. : 1. Vous ne saurez donc jamais quelles entreprises sont financées (malgré la transparence qui peut être faite sur les critères de sélection du fond), 2. Vous financez indirectement les activités spéculatives des autres fonds de Natixis, Amundi,etc

Une banque coopérative avec une vraie ambition de faire vivre la démocratie au sein de ses instances. Une banque transparente au service de projets engagés écologiquement, socialement avec un réel sens du bien commun. Des taux de rémunération faible sur le livret B, mais j'ai la garantie que mon argent sert à financer des projets éthiques, responsables.

titre_com: Ma petite planète m'a incité à…
commentaire: Ma petite planète (jeu) m'a incité à aller voir et à changer de banque qui me harcelait au téléphone par mail avec des publicités hors de prix bref ce que je détestais depuis longtemps ! le résultat est conforme à mes attentes. Bravo et merci !

Enfin la tranquillité d'esprit de savoir que mon argent sert vraiment, directement et que des projets en accord avec mes principes. Cerise sur le gâteau, des rapports humains efficaces, utiles et agréables en cas de besoin.

Il n'existe pas d'autre baque avec une éthique aussi poussée, aucune !On voit beaucoup de greenwashing, pas de greenwashing à la NEF.Seul bémol, nous attendons avec impatience les comptes courants particuliers, mais ça ne saurait tarder, surtout, si nous sommes encore un peu plus nombreux à mettre notre épargne à la NEF !

titre_com: Une banque étique qui donne sa place à…
commentaire: Une banque étique qui donne sa place à chacun peu importe les montants placés. Le financement de projet qui ont du sens et des valeurs humanistes et environnementales.

titre_com: Pas de service client ; pas d'écoute
commentaire: Déjà répondu : aucun contact, difficile de vous joindre ; dossier de 10 pages en réponse à une question sur le prêt à taux 0.Accès au service client bloqué si on ne l'utilise pas assez souvent, etc. Très lourd à gérer, compliqué.J'avais laissé beaucoup d'argent chez vous. Je viens de tout retirer car malgré mes alertes par tél, rien n'a changé. Service à sens unique.

titre_com: La Nef est une banque éthique
commentaire: La Nef est une banque éthique, tournée vers l'humain, où notre argent permet des financements utiles, en toute transparence.

titre_com: La vraie (et la seule!) banque éthique
commentaire: La seule banque qui répond vraiment à mes valeurs ! Choisir la NEF c'est faire un choix fort et qui a du sens. Dans la même lignée éthique, je vous conseille Enercoop, Telecoop, et autres membres des "Licoornes". Je suis à la NEF depuis des années et j'en suis extrêmement satisfait, foncez !

Projet intéressant, on sait où va notre argent contrairement aux banques "classiques" où la transparence n'existe pas.

titre_com: Très contente que mon argent serve pour des projets éthiques
commentaire: J'y pensais depuis longtemps et je me suis enfin lancée. L'inscription est très facile. Le compte est simple et efficace. Je le recommande à tout le monde pour que notre épargne finance de beaux projets !
Facile à utiliser, on ne vous embête pas pour vos mouvements d'argent, banque éthique, soutenant la société écologique, bienveillante, novatrice
contact facile, correspondants stables et aimables, et surtout on sait ce que cette épargne fait de notre argent : tout est transparent.

titre_com: La banque éthique pour un développement…
commentaire: La banque éthique pour un développement durable, soutenable et responsable !Une transparence exemplaire et réelle !

Ayant besoin de trésorerie, je voudrais récupérer mes parts sociales, voici la réponse reçu.BonjourSuite à votre demande, voici le document à nous retourner accompagné de votre carte d'identité, nous vous informons que nous sommes dans l'exercice 2024 nous pouvons enregistrer votre demande mais, le remboursement se fera après l'assemblé générale du mois de mai 2025.cela a certainement été écrit sur le contrat, mais j'aurais souhaité en etre bien averti en gros.

J'ai placé toute mon épargne sur un livret Nef car cela m'assure qu'elle soit utile pour la transition écologique et sociale.Aucune autre banque n'est transparente comme l'est la Nef en publiant tous les prêts octroyés chaque année.Vivement que nous puissions y ouvrir un compte courant avec une carte bancaire pour quitter définitivement les banques classiques qui piétinent notre planète et nos vies.

titre_com: La Nef porte une éthique et des valeurs…
commentaire: La Nef porte une éthique et des valeurs humaines irremplaçables et uniques en France. Je regrette que la Nef ne puisse pas gérer les compte courants.

The service I received from Sophie was absolutely outstanding, not only did she effectively deal with my transfer she also provided valuable information on how I could manage my account via the app. She is a total credit to Credit Agricole. Thanks again Sophie.
reponses: Thank you for your kind comment.

titre_com: The Britline team all speak perfect…
commentaire: The Britline team all speak perfect English and for an English person dealing with the very different and sometimes difficult French systems, they are an amazing team to have on your side! I recommend them to anyone who needs an account in France. My sister lives in Paris and is also with them! They are what ALL banks should be like! It has been a pleasure dealing with them over the last 15years!
Britline are simply superb... very helpful navigating the technical issues of living in france. i can certainly recommend the legal insurance policy its saved me so many times...

My wife and I own a mobile home in the mid Western France region. We changed our mobile home insurance from another well known company to CA Britline. The whole experience was seamless and efficient. It was a pleasure dealing with the insurance team of Debra and Clive in English too which was very helpful. We now feel more in control of the nitty gritty elements as they were explained and able to read them ourselves. Special mention to Michelle too who actually spoke with our old insurance company in person too. We now have our insurance policy within our own document folder within our Britline account which we can access anytime and share with our mobile home site owners. We fully recommend Credit Agricole Britline for a professional efficient service. Our UK bank could learn from their customer service.
Really thoughtful account managers and a great service - I wouldnt trust anyone else with my money

titre_com: Jehan who is the lady i always contact…
commentaire: Jehan who is the lady i always contact is so helpful and responds to all my emails in a very friendly way

titre_com: My app keeps reverting to husband's log in.
commentaire: Have been with Britline for over 20 years without issue and our advisor, Michelle, is lovely. However, the new app is a nightmare. It is a joint account but when I sign in, the app keeps reverting to my husband's name meaning I can't access my accounts or payees. Also means the app signs me in as my husband, so I can access his accounts - so much for GDPR! This needs fixing urgently as the only current resolution is to keep deleting the app and reinstalling from scratch. Please sort this out.

Bonjour Helen B.

Thank you for taking the time to leave this feedback.

Your account manager Michelle will be in touch shortly in order to discuss this with you further.

Annamarie - CA Britline

commentaire: We have used Britline for the whole of our renovation project in France which took us 13 years.We have never had a problem and their staff have always been extremely satisfied.We are happy to recommend them .Michael and Wendy Brightwell

We've been with Britline since we bought our first house over a decade ago. We've now lived in the house full-time for five years. Having extensive experience of UK banks and banking we're thrilled by the service and products here. Fiona Jacob has been brilliant with timely responses and advice... even when we ask the same questions every few years. Together with the excellent Crédit Agricole app we would happily recommend Britline!

I recently needed to close all my Britline accounts, having less need for them now following Brexit. Although there was an initial hiccup that delayed the process  communication to and from Britline was excellent throughout. The accounts are now closed, but I would have no hesitation to come back should the opportunity arise.

titre_com: Excellent service for all our banking needs.
commentaire: We lived in France for 27 years and I must say that all our dealings with CA Britline have always been extremely positive.  Although I am confident with technology, when I needed help or reassurance, it was always there. The staff are well trained and everyone we spoke to were efficient with excellent people skills.We would thoroughly recommend.

Have been a Credit Agricole Britline Customer for a number of years. I have always found them to be helpful, efficient and good value. Frankly, as an ex-pat I don't know how I would have managed without them. Love the service.

titre_com: We've lived in France now for 5 months…
commentaire: We've lived in France now for 5 months and have always found Britline to be very quick to respond and very helpful.  I don't know how we would have managed without them.I'd recommend them to anyone starting a new life in France

We had a CA Britline French bank account for over 20 years whilst we owned a property in France. We have always found them to be extremely helpful and gave us expert assistance on a wide variety of issues on numerous occasions. We have no hesitation in recommending them. Mr and Mrs W

titre_com: ⚠️ WARNING… Do not trust your money with…
commentaire: ⚠️ WARNING… Do not trust your money with Britline Credit Agricole Normandie.  June 2024:  My aunt recently passed away just under two years after opening her account with “Britline’ Credit Agricole Normandie. We opened it as it offered English speaking customer service agents and as she was elderly and felt more comfortable speaking on the telephone rather than doing anything online.  Four months to the day after she passed away, I signed her succession documents in the Notaires office.  I noticed while going through the paperwork that the balance transferred to the Notaire’s account by CA Normandie ‘Britline’ was different to the balance on the paperwork they had sent over for the balance on the date of her death. €629.15c euros was missing. I asked her if the bank had sent a statement of transactions (debts) and interest accrued (credit) since my aunts death and she replied no. Over a three week period I rang the bank enquiring about this matter as a family member holding power of attorney and acting on behalf of the next of kin. The bank said they would only deal with the Notaire (French State Solicitor). I feel this was inreasonable. However when requesting three times over three separate phone calls that the bank send a full statement to the Notaire, they repeatedly failed to do this. I checked with the Notaire twice and she said she had received nothing in the form of a statement (debts/interest) originally from CA Normandie when they first sent my aunts bank date of death statement and nothing since explaining the charges. On contacting the bank the third time, they decided they would speak to me. I was able to find out where the €629.15c went. €9.15c was on a special ‘direct debit’ (no explanation for what it was… it just stated ‘special direct debit’). The remaining €620.00c was for ‘Succession Documents’ (Inheritance bank statement). These consisted of two A4 pages ‘Britline’ had sent to the Notaire. These two pages listed the sole account number and ‘balance on date of death’ on one page and a 9 line paragraph on the other page with the Notaires address and customers name and details. The nine lines was ‘standard phraseology’ required information that would be expected on anyone’s bank statement. There were no special circumstances or further paperwork or explanations. When speaking to the same bank manager who opened the account two years earlier he talked for two minutes about “all the reasons” for this €620 charge. It was a lot of over inflated hot air. He even went as far as to state that “decisions about who the inheritors were..had to be made”. I had to point out that this was complete rubbish because one, that was the Notaire’s and State of France’s responsibility and two that had been established before the bank was even aware their client had died. He was just making rubbish up on the spot to try and justify a €620 euro charge for sending out two A4 pages. In contrast, the accounts held by my aunt with Allied Irish bank, Bank of Scotland, The Halifax and La Poste, all sent out the same two A4 pages and… their letters started with their condolences and some (even if fake) respect considering my aunts death. All those financial institutions didn’t charge a penny, not one penny to send out those same letters and the banks statement for each account.  When speaking to the manager, there was a distinct air of contempt as he ate food while talking on the phone and one could really sense the ‘I don’t give sh**’ attitude hidden under the pretence of professionalism. Every time I pointed out something relèvent he simply replied ‘uhmmm…’. Complete contempt for the situation. It made me completely aware that Britline saw opportunity for ‘easy money’ …someone else’s money as they rub their hands. Banks are banks…I’m no fool. They are just there to make money no matter how beautiful the Black horse advert is (Lloyd’s) or how the nice the individual person is you speak to in the moment. However a good judge of the quality of a bank is how they act when things are going wrong or you have a problem… not when things are going well and you don’t need their help. I strongly advise potential customers to clearly understand what ‘hidden’ charges their bank has and ask direct straight questions when opening any bank account so you understand how you will be treated when you wish to close that account or transfer money.🔴 I cannot recommend ‘Britline’ CA NORMANDIE as a bank to trust your money with.  They failed to divulge to the Notaire what the charges were for. They failed to list any interest accrued even if it was zero (€0) and treated family members with contempt and the deceased’s bank account with opportunism.
reponses:
Dear Mr Bond,

Thank you for taking the time to leave this detailed review.

We are sorry to hear that you have not been happy with the service and information provided by our team at this difficult time.

We will be reaching out to you directly in order to discuss this matter further.

Annamarie from CA Britline

commentaire: I started with Britline when I moved to France 6+ years ago and still use them for most things today (day to day banking, loans and car and home insurance). I've also used their international payments service a number of times.The team has helped me to more easily understand the world of French banking. This is France and things work differently to the UK but having someone explain the nuances in English has been valuable!Recommend without a doubt!

titre_com: CA Britline - English speaking French Banking
commentaire: Crédit Agricole Britline have been great in helping me navigate the French Banking system which is very different from the UK. Their app is easy to use and they have been helpful in arranging insurances as well. If you need English speaking advice from a French Bank Britline hits the spot with their personal bankers.Crédit Agricole Britline m'a beaucoup aidé à m'y retrouver dans le système bancaire français qui est très différent de celui du Royaume-Uni. Leur application est facile à utiliser et ils m'ont aidé à souscrire des assurances. Si vous avez besoin de conseils en anglais de la part d'une banque française, Britline fait l'affaire avec ses banquiers personnels.

I could not have survived in France without Britline ! That is not even an understatement. Safe and reliable, it is the best service I could ever hope for, english speaking, personalised service, card blocking at a touch, my own bank manager, Karen Donegan... who even organised my mortgage, insurance and savings accounts.  An absolute must for any expat or anyone in fact - I am not sure I would get this kind of service from a bank if I was French/spoke fluent french! Thank you Karen and Britline!

titre_com: An utter indifference to the customer…
commentaire: An utter indifference to the customer experience. Typical French banking bureaucracy and complexity with added arrogance because they speak English to you as they do it so you should be extra grateful. Finally, with the amount of alternatives appearing, people can vote with their feet and maybe one day things will improve. I am leaving for sure. Possibly the worst customer service experience I have ever had. Except Orange but they are so bad it's almost entertaining. Use literally anyone else.
reponses:
Hello Private Private.

We are very sorry to hear that you are unhappy with the service you have recived from the CA Britline team.

Based on the information shared with us in your review, we have not been able to identify you as a customer.

We would love to have the opportunity to discuss your experience in more detail.

Please do not hesitate to contact us directly by email to contact@britline.com marked for the attention of Annamarie.

We look forward to hearing from you.

Annamarie from CA Britline

titre_com: Excellent adviser (Maria celeste DE GAALON) at Britline
commentaire: Maria celeste DE GAALON, the advisor, steered me through a protracted process of making changes to my banking and insurance policies following the death of my husband. The service was excellent because she was knowledgeable, thorough, patient, and timely in responses. She went out of her way to provide me with a posted letter as evidence for my carte grise.  I felt in safe hands and her english was excellent both for emails and the telephone call.
Excellente application simple et intuitive.Service client au top et en plus on aide la cause animale.Quoi de mieux !

titre_com: J'ai ouvert un compte bancaire en ligne…
commentaire: J'ai ouvert un compte bancaire en ligne Chez Monese Bank. Depuis le Mois Novembre 2020,ils ont Bloqué mon Application et désactivé ma carte bancaire sans Explication Aucune. J'ai envoyé plus de 20 Mails pour trouver une solution sans jamais y parvenir. J'ai finalement décidé de clôturé le compte tout en demandant la Restitution de mon solde Qui s'élève à 1450€. J'AI TOUJOURS RIEN REÇU et pire, ils répondent plus à mes mails. Je demande pas autre chose Que la clôture du compte et la Restitution de ce Qui me revient de droit, c'est à dire mes 1450€. Je trouve cette attitude pas du tout professionnel. Et c'est vraiment dommage. Je rappelle Que cette histoire date depuis Novembre 2020.Mon Application sur mon smartphone a été bloqué par leur soins et ils ont aussi désactivé ma carte bancaire depuis Novembre 2020

Super travail d’investigation pour fournir les meilleures infos sur les banques en ligne mais aussi tout ce qui gravite autour. Ça change des articles d’actus sans intérêt qui polluent internet pour faire plaisir à google ! Merci à l’équipe, du beau boulot 😊

Expérience excellente avec boursobank Je m en sers de deuxième compte Ouverture de compte facile et rapide Carte gratuite Gestion de compte gratuite Prime de 150e directement crédité sur le compte jusqu'au 9 novembre 2023 sinon 130e Profitez en avec le code PELE2926 Je recommande

super site, cest d'ailleurs sur ce siteque.j ai opté pour monese bank ！！！Ouvrez un compte mobile Monese et recevez jusqu'à 20 € gratuitement (en fonction de votre devise). Utilisez simplement mon code d'invitation... GREGO827 Téléchargez l'app Monese

commentaire: Comparatif des banques en ligne clair, complet et concis. En comparant les prix sur le site web, j'ai pu choisir la meilleure banque après un temps de réflexion. Les articles sont précis et succincts et permettent d'obtenir des avis éclairés sur les produits et services proposés par les banques.
Un comparateur clair et précis que j'utilise autant pour me tenir au courant des offres que des informations sur ce qui se passe dans le domaine de la finance. Merci pour votre travail.

titre_com: Mon compte a été désactivé sans aucune…
commentaire: Mon compte a été désactivé sans aucune raison et je n’ai aucune réponse de votre part. J’attends une brève réponse merci bien
reponses:
Bonjour,
Nous ne bloquons jamais les comptes sans raisons valables, nous n'y voyons pas l'intérêt.
Nous nous réservons le droit de limiter l'accès à l'application si nos conditions générales d'utilisation ne sont pas respectées mais aussi afin de respecter la réglementation en vigueur en matière de vigilance.
Notre service client est à votre disposition pour en discuter.
Bien cordialement,

titre_com: J’ai reçu un virement vous avez…
commentaire: J’ai reçu un virement vous avez désactivé mon compte , je n’ai plus accès , et vous demander la preuve du virement que j’ai transmis depuis pas de réponse , j’ai besoin de cet argent pour des soins ou ramène l’argent à l’expéditeur c’est très urgent
reponses:
Bonjour,

Après recherche, nous n'avons pas de client au nom d'Olivier FOY, par ailleurs, vous semblez résider en Côte d'Ivoire or nos comptes ne peuvent être ouvert uniquement à des résidents français.
Enfin, nous nous réservons le droit de bloquer un compte lorsque nos conditions d’utilisation ne sont pas respectées, mais aussi afin de respecter la réglementation en vigueur en matière de vigilance.

titre_com: J’ai ouvert un compte chez eux au bout…
commentaire: J’ai ouvert un compte chez eux au bout de 5 jours le compte a été clôturé sans raison heureusement que j’ai pas déposer mon argent chez eux
reponses:
Bonjour,

Nous sommes assez étonnés de votre message, les ouvertures de compte pour particulier ont été mises en pause depuis cet été. S'il s'agit de compte professionnel, nous n'avons fermé qu'un seul compte après 5 jours et nous vous avons donné les raisons, si vous êtes bien la personne que nous croyons, vous aviez très bien compris les raisons de cette décision. Mais malheureusement sans information pour vous identifier, nous ne pouvons pas prendre contact avec vous.

commentaire: Je souhaitais partager mon expérience, car j’ai été plus qu’agréablement surpris par OnlyOne. Je dois dire qu’au départ, j’étais plutôt dubitatif, mais aujourd’hui, je suis heureux de leurs avoirs faits confiance ! OnlyOne, c’est un service de qualité irréprochable, une application efficace et intuitive, mais avant tout un pas vers l’avant en matière d’éco responsabilité. Merci OnlyOne pour ce beau travail !!!

titre_com: Carte non utilisable encore une fois
commentaire: Carte non utilisable encore une fois, aucun retrait possible mais frais de retrait prelevé alors qu'en plus le premier retrait est gratuit,tous les paiements sont refusés egalement. Avec une petite fille a charge , me voilà sans moyen de paiement pour 3 jours et bien sur, personne pour repondre dans l'urgence. Au début tout va bien puis par la suite, on ne cesse de se plaindre, je vais quitter cette "banque"

titre_com: J'avais envoyé un mail au service…
commentaire: J'avais envoyé un mail au service client le matin et j'ai reçu un appel de leur part l'après-midi même ! La personne au téléphone m'a bien expliqué le soucis et je pense que cet établissement est vraiment sérieux et très réactif. Je verrai sur le long terme, mais pour le moment rien à redire.

titre_com: Pour l instant pas de souci mais pas de…
commentaire: Pour l instant pas de souci mais pas de grosses sommes versées pour l instant . Quand je lit dans les avis que OnlyOne  a rappelé des clients je trouve cela bizarre. Le numéro renseigné sur internet ne répond jamais !!!!! Si j avais une réponse de leur part ce serais formidable !!!!!
reponses:
Bonjour,

Merci pour votre commentaire.

Nous vous invitons à nous joindre au 01 76 35 02 95, joignable de 9h30 à 17h30, pour toute demande d'information ou nous écrire à l'adresse mail : support@onlyonecard.eu où l'on vous répond sous un délai maximum de 24h ouvrées (hors week-end).

Nous restons à votre disposition pour répondre à vos interrogations.

Bien à vous,

titre_com: J'ai fait une demande d'ouverture de…
commentaire: J'ai fait une demande d'ouverture de compte,et je suis vraiment surpris que le compte est été ouvert très rapidement en un jour, le conseiller au top , il m'a appelé pour me dire que tous était ok, réponse très rapide quand qu'on envoie un mail. Je recommande vivement.

Bonjour avant toute chose,Cette banque mobile est vraiment excellente, de même pour l'application très intuitive et facile à prendre en main. Le service client est très aimable et très réactif. Je recommande vivement ONLYONE. Philippe mout

titre_com: franchement il y a pas plus sérieux…
commentaire: franchement il y a pas plus sérieux comme banque jamais vous aurez de problème une gentillesse exemplaire par rapport à toutes les banques alors oui je conseille et toujours à votre écoute

Ne faite pas confiance à cette nouvelle banque ce sont des voleur il vous bloque votre argent si vous dépasser les 1000e sur votre compte puis vous demande des documents impossibles pour que vous lâché l affaire et reparte avec votre argent
reponses:
Bonjour,
Nous ne bloquons pas les comptes sans raisons valables, vous n'êtes pas sans savoir que tout établissement financier est régulé et doit respecter des règles de conformité qui sont les mêmes pour les établissements comme le notre ou les banques traditionnelles.
Il est impossible de repartir avec l'argent comme vous le dites, les fonds sont soit débloqués, si vous êtes en mesure d'en justifier la provenance ou restitués à l'émetteur du virement.
SI toutefois, quelque chose n'est pas clair, nous vous invitons à nous contacter.

commentaire: Je n’ai que de bonnes choses à dire sur Onlyone. On a été à mon écoute, très humains à mon égard pendant une période difficile de ma vie.Le fait qu’elle soit engagée pour l’environnement, transparente et nous coach au quotidien sur notre impact est parfait.Je recommande fortement.

titre_com: Service client au top et réactif
commentaire: Je suis a cette banque depuis l'ouverture et franchement j'ai pas envie de changer. Conseiller qui répond très rapidement a chaque fois que j'ai besoin d'aide et ils ont toujours répondus à mes besoins... Je vous la recommande 😉

titre_com: Avec toute ma Sympathie et bien à vous
commentaire: Bonjour Madame et Monsieur,L'application de cette banque est extrêmement et assurément bien pensée, très simple et facile d'utilisation et évidemment agréable. Toujours cette phrase qui décrit le mieux OnlyOne « Mention spéciale » au service clients, avec un soutien majeur en cas de pépin véritablement à la hauteur de la fintech, sans délais avec des conseillers fort aimable, souriant, toujours disponible et doté d'un excellent sens du devoir accomplit;OnlyOne est très bien fait...Le service client est très réactif !Banque avec une application pour téléphone portable fort utile ou tout se pilote du bout des doigts mais pas que cela car OnlyOne est également joignable par courriel, téléphone fixe et service website...De plus, on sent bien que l’équipe d'OnlyOne prend absolument au sérieux son engagement de protection de la nature et de l’environnement. En tant que client (de la toute première heure) je suis tenu informé et au courant de leurs initiatives et j'admire leurs enthousiasmes énergiques et de la préservation de l’environnement et de la transition écologique.  Je remercie le service client d'OnlyOne qui m'a bien aidé ce-jour avec un énorme soucis de carte bancaire volée et cela en un temps record...Avec toute ma Sympathie et bien à vous,Christophe Bénazeth
Je recommande fortement cette banque qu’il est vraiment au top avec un service client réactif je suis vraiment satisfait du service est la personne que j’ai eu au téléphone 😊

Je suis très satisfait des services de OnlyOne. Une équipe très professionnelle, une application très intuitive et agréable et je sens que j'ai un impact positif sur l'environnement. Je recommande fortement.
Excellente expérience. Antoine est très rapide, pro et efficace c'est un plaisir. Pour Onlyone 5 étoiles bien méritées. :-) Longue vie à toute l'équipe !

titre_com: Banque en ligne éthique et sérieuse
commentaire: Banque en ligne sérieuse, prometteuse et surtout éthique ! Je recommande. Assistance accessible et réponses rapides en cas de besoin. Merci !
Grande banque pour l'environnement. Le support en particulier est réactif et tout est si bon, de l'ouverture de compte aux transactions

titre_com: Compte ouvert il y a quelques mois
commentaire: Compte ouvert il y a quelques mois . Pour l instant pas de souci mais je trouve les réponses par mails un peu longue 2 a 3 jours . Paiement par carte le 6 juillet multiplie par 3 et à ce jour pas remboursé de la différence.pas de numéro service client . Dommage 😰 sinon rien a dire.
reponses:
Bonjour,

Merci d'avoir partagé votre expérience.

Nous sommes navrés pour les délais de réponse. Nous nous efforçons de répondre sous un délai maximum de 24h ouvrées (hors week-end).

Nous vous invitons à nous contacter au 01 76 35 02 95 pour toute difficulté rencontrée (joignable de 9h30 à 17h30).

À votre disposition.

I've rang the phone number they have on their website and also the one they have in Bayonne. No one picks up the phone. No one replies to the emails sent through their contact form.

reponses:
Bonjour,

Nous vous remercions pour votre avis. Les retours de nos clients sont une source d'information essentielle pour nous améliorer. Nous y prêtons une grande attention.
Nous avons mis en place une enquête interne afin de mieux comprendre les raisons de votre insatisfaction.
Les frais perçus par Empruntis assurance vous sont communiqués dans le devis qui vous est envoyé avant toutes démarches effectuées auprès de nos partenaires.
Lors de vos premiers échanges avec votre courtière assurance, celle-ci vous a demandé si vous l’aviez regardé et ce que vous en pensiez. Il n’y a pas eu d’éléments de votre part concernant les frais Empruntis, le dossier s’est donc naturellement poursuivi jusqu’à la finalisation de ce dernier.


Cordialement,
L'équipe Empruntis.com
